article: My wife and I moved into our home nine years ago and we spent a lot of time in the yard getting it look like it does today. But the front of the house is another story. We called it our"rock _ "as there were so many rocks here. Whenever possible,we would stick some plants out front, just to bring some _ to the area. Last summer I had reached the end of the garden and found a(n) _ little plant that I could not _ identify .I knew I didn't _ it and my wife said that she didn't either. We decided to let it _ growing until we could figure out what it was. Weeks passed and as I made my way _ to the strange plant,it appeared to be a sunflower. It was spindly standing with a tall skinny stalk and only one head on it. I decided to care for it,but as I _ weeds and rocks from the area,I noticed something _ .The sunflower had not _ where I saw the _ .It _ had begun under a big rock and grown under and around it to reach the _ . That's when I realized that if a tiny sunflower did n' t _ a big rock stand in its way of developing,we too have the _ to do the same thing . Once our environment begins to see that we believe in ourselves _ that little sunflower,we can _ the same nourishment and nurturing as well.   _ tall like the sunflower and be _ of who and what you are and the environment will begin to _ you. You will find a way to go under or around your big barriers in order to reach your desires.
